extendedInfo.description: - 3D Camera is cutting-edge, and very different from any other app available on the Market. It has NO equivalent on the iPhone. - 3D Camera does not require 3D or red-blue glasses, or a 3D-capable phone. Any phone with Android >= 2.1 can run it.- 3D Camera uses experimental, research-grade algorithms to generate an OpenGL rendering of a 3D scene computed from your own pictures.- You can navigate freely in the scene: move in all directions and zoom in/out. The accelerometer is also supported. - Your 3D scenes can be shared online. They be seen in 3D on a normal computer screen! 3D Camera allows to post directly on Facebook / Twitter / Google+Here is a sample scene created with 3D Camera: http://goo.gl/6GBfLQUICK MANUAL:- There are two ways to create a 3D scene, you can select them in the main menu of the app: manual (1 picture) or server-assisted (2 pictures).* The server-assisted method uploads your pictures to a server to determine the depth of the scene automatically.* The manual method let you specify the depth of each object.Which one should you choose?* From our experience, the manual method gives the best results. But if you are a fan of cutting-edge technology, give the server-assisted method a try!HOW TO GET BETTER RESULTS USING THE SERVER-ASSISTED METHOD:* Keep in mind that the server-assisted method is experimental. It may fail to find the correct depth of some areas in your image. * Anyway, you will be given the opportunity to manually correct the depth later. It's the "Correct depth" option when long-pressing an item in the main menu.* Before taking pictures, read the 3D Camera guide first: inside the main menu, press your phone menu button, then "Tutorial". In short, the server-assisted method works best with two very close pictures of an inanimate object, which is far away from a still background.* If you photograph a person, make sure she/he really doesn't move.* When translated to the right, the camera should see exactly the same view of the object as in the left picture. A translation means that you should not make a circular motion around you or around the object.* The distance between the camera and the foreground matters. It should be at least 1 meter (3 feet).* Uniform areas (e.g., white walls) may yield an incorrect server-assisted depth.FAQQ: The 3D effect is very wrong in the scene I have created.A: Please use the "Correct depth" menu (long press on the scene in the main menu), it does wonders.Q: It says the application is always offline, or it told me to update. Why can't my old version work online?A: 3D Camera needs a server to generate 3D scenes. We're continuously changing the server to improve 3D Camera. Older versions won't be compatible. Also, if you live in China, it's likely that our Google server is blocked.Q: When I create my project, it fails with the "repair me" logo, or it keeps saying "server is busy".A: The 3D Camera server may be under maintenance. We typically fix it quickly. Meanwhile, you can still use the manual depth method (by taking just 1 picture), or edit the depth yourself then click onQ: Why does 3D Camera upload to a server anyway? A: Creating the scene would take too long on a phone. We're merely speeding things up by 10x by providing you this free server. Note that you don't need to use this feature: the manual method works entirely offline.Q: Some antivirus programs report that 3D Camera ads (from LeadBolt) may steal personal information.A: 3D Camera only displays HTML ads, i.e. web pages. This type of advertisement cannot read any information stored in your phone. Hence, in 3D Camera, your personal information cannot be accessed by LeadBolt or any other ad provider.Q: The app made me a fine scene! I have no question whatsoever!A: We would love to hear positive feedback from time to time :) Write us at r120player@gmail.com or twitter: http://twitter.com/3DCameraAndroid

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: What a great app.  A lot of fun to use.  Not a replacement for your primary camera; in a league of its own.  Take new pics or import from your library.  Recommended!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bull dust
reviews.comment: This app is full of crap......seen previous coments dat it just stays black screen .......should have believed it.....bull dust($h!T)....do not download
reviews.author: Rameez Lalloo

reviews.title: Amazing Technology!
reviews.comment: This worked perfectly for me on my RAZR i, absolute amazed that such an effect could be created using a mobile phone. It gives me some bragging rights too, because my daughter can\'t do anything like this with her iPhone. :-)
reviews.author: Graham Phillips

reviews.title: Very poor app
reviews.comment: If I had paid for this app I would call the company a fraud because of how the so called \"server\" is always too busy and for the past two days I\'ve retried and retried and it still says the so called \"server\" is too busy to make my picture. Bad app nuff said delete this app indefinitely!
reviews.author: Jimmy Natividad

reviews.title: 3d what?
reviews.comment: Totally useless always black screen cant even use them on phone as wallpaper have to send to picassi if id paid for i would want my money back
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Problems when trying to create pictures. Says server not found- been this way for more than two weeks now, wouldn\'t consider buying an app with bad or interrupted service. Or make it work offline instead. Fix and I\'ll re-rate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Interesting cocept - but
reviews.comment: I get what is trying to be done here.  And as a gimmick, it\'s cute.    But as someone who works with Real 3D (photos and 3D HD video), this just doesn\'t cut it.    Worse, is like others report, it freezes/crashes and has to be manually forced to close.    Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Derek JA

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Froze cameras several timers could not get one picture to work
reviews.author: Dennis Bender

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: Can\'t click proceed button usually, if you can, it fc after 2nd image. Would try again. Uninstall for now. Note by Samsung
reviews.author: Chaz Morrow

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: While the idea is good, the results are disastrous. Even the provided examples are terrible.
reviews.author: Diego Pazos

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: Froze phone, no result displayed. Uninstalled. Droid4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unique viewing method!
reviews.comment: Giving 4  stars instead of 5 for 2 reasons... The effort to get the right alignment for a 2 pic combo might be too much for some one in a hurry. The single pic auto mode is fine.  Second, I\'m still a parallel or anaglyph purist for overall quality and sharing, but this app is equal to or better than Sony\'s in camera 3D. IMHO. Thanks!
reviews.author: Mark Draper

reviews.title: Cool but crap
reviews.comment: Once your Screen goes black, it never comes back. Then I gotta start all over :(  also it takes a long time. And is confusing.  But cool when it works. 2 stars
reviews.author: Jordan Bleu

reviews.title: Good idea -  Works but...
reviews.comment: Samsung G3, Definitely a cool idea based on depth mapping and Stereoscopic imagery.    However it crashes when using large images, phone can\'t handle the calculation when doing manual depth.    Server was fine for me at full image sizes. App locked up and locked phone touch screen up... couldn\'t delete projects. Or shut app down.  Works but depends on phone capabilities. Sad every app insists on running Still needs work, possible phone system check to see if system can handle internal manual and photosize.?
reviews.author: Oh Henry

reviews.title: App is garbage.
reviews.comment: Running a beast of a phone and all I get after taking a picture is a black screen and then the app becomes unresponsive. Don\'t download this waste of memory. GALAXY NOTE 2, if it doesn\'t work on mine then good luck.
reviews.author: Steve Hughes

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: It\'s not what you thing it does, but it\'s smart never the less..  and funny.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good but always force  stop. Pls fix. Tnx
